detail_desc: Straight-cut dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a drawstring and small frill trim around the neckline and an opening at the top. Wide, raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
A pair of hoop earrings in metal and plastic.
Short top in soft organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short flounced sleeves.
Pull-on shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Bag in imitation leather and imitation suede with a wide, longer handle at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Depth approx. 10 cm. Width approx. 26 cm. Height approx. 34 cm.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with gathers and a small frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Seam below the bust and at the hem with wide, tiered flounces.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with terry hearts, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in twill made from a viscose and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a bow at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with flutter sleeves and slits in the sides.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Fitted top in a soft, fine, textured knit with short puff sleeves that have narrow trims with concealed elastication.

Set with a dress and leggings. Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, a chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Braided imitation suede belt. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Wedge-heeled sandals in suede with long straps at the top that tie around the ankles, jute heel caps and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Triangle bikini top with scalloped trims and gathered, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Strapless, velour bandeau bikini top with a tie detail at the front and lined, lightly padded cups that shape the bust. Concealed silicone trim at the top, side support and a fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket.

Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, a wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in a double layer of chiffon with narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Made partly from recycled polyester.
Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Top in sweatshirt fabric decorated with studs. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports vest tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, pleats and straight, slightly shorter legs.
Short necklace in wide, shiny metal chain. Adjustable length 42-51 cm.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset and longer legs with laser-cut hems. Light shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in a soft, rib-knit organic cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a unique nursing function. Round neckline, short, flounced sleeves that are elasticated at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust. The design includes a double layer at the front to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Jersey lining. The dress is made partly from recycled polyester.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Inner top with elastication below the bust.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long sleeves with cuffs.

Tailored jacket woven in a sturdy wool blend with wide peak lapels and a fastening with two concealed buttons at the front. Neat silhouette with a soft, detachable belt at the waist, flap welt front pockets, a slit at the cuffs and a high single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a contrasting colour button placket and a kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist and lined gusset.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, deep neckline.
Poncho in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.
Airy chiffon blouse with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs. Partly lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Softshell popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Lined hood and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening at the top. Diagonal, zipped front pockets, an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Lined, non-wired, one-shoulder bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Suede shoulder bag with two handles, a narrow detachable shoulder strap, one small outer compartment with a zip and a keyring that is attached with a strap. Zip at the top and two smaller inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 8x15x22 cm.

Striped shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front, Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Relaxed fit – a straight, relaxed shape with good room for movement to create a loose, comfortable silhouette.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a loop and decorative tassels at one side and a zip at the other. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a foldover top and long sleeves.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed jersey. Length 35 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a large bow.
Narrow, braided belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric with a gathered yoke at the front, buttons at the back of the neck and a small flounced trim over the shoulders. Lined at the top.
Pyjamas in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with press-studs at the top and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.

Shorter jacket in a lightweight weave with a double-layered drawstring hood, stand-up collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Large flap chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with tapered legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with an imitation leather appliqué, faux fur pompom on the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Top in soft jersey with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem.

High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide, elasticated panel to hold in and shape the waist and sculpting seams at the back to showcase the body’s physique. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hoop earrings in hole-patterned metal with pendants at the bottom. Length 3.5 cm.
